column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I live in the neighborhood and Ba-Ba-Reeba was always a reliable place for a quick good meal. However
column2: my last visit was so bad I felt compelled to write this review. I came for brunch on A Sunday. We ordered several tapas some of which came out quickly while others took over a half hour. The last dish came out 45 minutes after ordering and we were no longer hungry. When we reminded the waitress that we had ordered the dish
column3: she rudely told us she was aware. She made us feel like she was doing us a huge favor every time she came by to check on us and getting the bill seemed like a huge inconvenience. It was not the service I'm used to with Lettuce Entertain You restaurants. Needless to say
